data.name: Violation: Before the Storm
data.detailed_description:
Get Deeper into the Story from Violation with the Before the Storm DLC.

NEW STORY


You are Test Subject B-17281, The "Master Monster" only let you Free when you complete the Challenges he has for You.
Each Challenge is a new Experience. Can you Complete his Challenge and earn your Freedom?

NEW ENVIRONMENTS


Complete new Environments to explore.
A Dark City and more is coming!

Are you Ready to go deeper into the Story from Violation?
We recommend to play the Main Story first before entering the DLC Story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5 or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7 or Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing in the workplace: frequent depictions of violence, blood or mutilation, general adult content
